summary: Just a little mod to brighten magic spells. Especially useful for darker/realistic lighting mods.
descriptionHtml:
Just a little mod to brighten magic spells. Especially useful for darker/realistic lighting mods. Fire spells will give out more light than lightning, and ice is the darkest.

New spell Sunlight included, it\'s a 1-day duration Magelight with higher magicka cost.
Magelights and Sunlights are brighter and can be multi-cast.

Should be compatible with all mods except those which replaces/enhances Magelight.
author: Zycat
